app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Video Editor Slow Motion SloMo
app_description: Make super slow motion videos with Slo Mo Video! From your library or the camera choose moments to speed up or slow down. Add music and filters then share your hilarious Slo Mo Video on Instagram! Features: Choose from your library or record a new one with the camera. Edit video speed up to 240fps or 12x faster or Slower. Select the moments you want to speed up or slow down. And add freeze frames. Choose from over 40 color filters to make it pop. Add Music from your library Share your Slow Motion creation on Instagram YouTube Facebook and other social media platforms. Export your video for different aspect ratios Slow your videos down to show off your true sports technique. Your Slow Motion Video subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto renew at any time from your iTunes account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. Read more about our terms and conditions here: Terms of Use Privacy Policy: https: www.loyal.app privacy policy
